title: Blacksmith workshop
creator_credit: Perspective Films, Southern Illinois University and Howard Cotton
brief_description: Artists at the “blacksmith workshop” learn blacksmithing a creative medium. After a few hours of instruction, students begin working on anvils and forges, and as they become familiar with the technique, they turn and shape the iron pieces Suitable for secondary years 7-12.
